description.@en: You bless a person with keen insight, evening the odds in their favor.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch is immediately moved to the top of the Initiative Ladder and can take their Turn immediately. A Character can only gain the benefit of this Magick once per day.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you do not expend the reagent.

criticalFailure.@en: Your Magick utterly fails, as the person you would have touched immediately moves to the bottom of the Initiative Ladder and loses their next Turn.

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
